mapper.select: SELECT m.movie_id, m.movie_name, t.type_name, m.on_time, m.language, m.country, m.movie_time, m.director, m.actor, m.movie_img, m.movie_video, avg (c.start) as start FROM tb_movie m, tb_movie_type t, tb_movie_comment c WHERE m.type_id = t.type_id AND m.movie_id = c.movie_id GROUP BY c.movie_id

SELECT m.movie_id, m.movie_name, t.type_name, m.on_time, m.language, m.country, m.movie_time, m.director, m.actor, m.movie_img, m.movie_video, m.profile, avg (c.start) as start FROM tb_movie m, tb_movie_type t, tb_movie_comment c WHERE m.type_id = t.type_id AND m.movie_id = c.movie_id AND m.movie_id=#{movieId} GROUP BY c.movie_id
